mutants.code:
def minIterations(N, M, X, Y):
    x = X + 1
    y = Y - 1
    leftDistance = y
    rightDistance = M - y - 1
    topDistance = x
    bottomDistance = N - x - 1
    maxHor = max(leftDistance, rightDistance)
    maxVer = max(topDistance, bottomDistance)
    return maxHor + maxVer

    maxHor = max(leftDistance, rightDistance)
    maxVer = max(topDistance, bottomDistance)
    return maxHor + maxVer
